title: SkinBoost with no skin!
body: I own all but one Annie skin, that being Hextech Annie. I got Annie in an ARAM and used skin boost hoping I could play with the wonderful skin for the first time :( But to my surprise it did not unlock any skins for me. Had I known that I wouldn't have done a "SKIN" boost. Rito pls help.

replies.body:
I took a look into this and it seems due to the nature that you obtain Hextech Annie, which is solely through Hextech Crafting, it doesn't look like her skin is available through a skin boost.

Let me know if you have any questions.
